Key: ...Aah, aah, aaaah... Okay it seems to have\nstabilized.

You're... not an NPC, right? Is it possible that
you're communicating from the outside?
...Yes. It seems...can't freely...all the time.\nI don't know when...this communication\n...will be disconnected.
It does seem kind of unstable...

I understand. That's right. How are we?
In the real world, I mean.

Ah... Sounds like she's been cut off. Oh, well.
Can't be helped.
